title: RSO – a swashy sans
content:
Hello all,

The Finnish radio Symphony Orchestra has an interesting font in their ads in the public transport. I assume this is the italic version of it, but what is it?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081211152438im_/http:/typophile.com/files/ylapalkki_fin_5023.jpg)

[http://yle.fi/rso/?lang=eng](http://web.archive.org/web/20081211152438/http:/yle.fi/rso/?lang=eng "http://yle.fi/rso/?lang=eng")

 [‹ Elegant serif](http://web.archive.org/web/20081211152438/http:/typophile.com/node/49115 "Go to previous forum topic") [Low Life typeface ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081211152438/http:/typophile.com/node/49111 "Go to next forum topic")
author: mili

comments.content:
Thank you, Jan!  
Underware crossed my mind, should’ve followed that thought a bit further.
Long time no see, mili. You’re welcome.
